name: HackUMass-Bughouse-Chess
body:
# HackUMass-Bughouse-Chess
First Hackathon Project at HackUMass on 4-11-15

Authors:
* Richard Cui
* Diane Tam
* SeihakRithy Muth

Basic Project Goals:
* 4 players, 2 per team
* Playable over local network

Stretch Project Goals:
* Restart game
* Win condition
* Hosting on server
* Pass data using JSON
* Rules enforcement

![UML Diagram](https://github.com/Rithy58/hackumass-bughouse-chess/raw/master/IMG_3575.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
